summary:
Sun Born are descendants of people said to be born in the sun.
Abilities:
They are skilled with both one-handed and two-handed swords. Great health regeneration at the cost of 20 starting health. Can battle cry.
descriptionHtml:
Sun Born are descendants of people said to be born in the sun.Â 
Abilities:
They are skilled with both one-handed and two-handed swords. Great health regeneration at the cost of 20 starting health. Can battle cry.

To install:
1)Download the mod [url=https://www.copy.com/s/vH1UTHJ2vieakyXn]here[/url].
2)To download click the 'Save' button.
3)Extract the .zip
4)Drag Contents into your Skyrim>Data folder.
5)Make sure the mod file is enabled in the data-files section in your launcher.
6)Play!
7) (optional)If you already have a character and don't want to start a new one to use this race, in the console type 'showracemenu' and change your race.
author: BalboaTheGreat
